RHaP.import_image module¶

RHaP.import_image.image(image_path, transpose)[source]¶

Import and Transpose an image.

Parameters

  • image_path (str) – Path to the image, excluding extension, including name

  • transpose (Boolean Value) – Whether the image needs to be rotated so that radial hydrides are in the vertical direction If True: Image will be transposed If False: Image will not be transposed

Returns

The transposed/imported image to be analysed

Return type

original_image
